R

requestFailedWithStatusCode(int) - Method in interface com.basecamp.turbolinks.TurbolinksAdapter
Called when Turbolinks receives an HTTP error from a Turbolinks request.
reset() - Static method in class com.basecamp.turbolinks.Turbolinks
Sets the singleton to null and Turbolinks into an uninitialized state.
resetToColdBoot() - Static method in class com.basecamp.turbolinks.Turbolinks
Resets the singleton to go through the full cold booting sequence (full page load) on the next Turbolinks visit.
restoreWithCachedSnapshot(boolean) - Method in class com.basecamp.turbolinks.Turbolinks
Optional By default Turbolinks will "advance" to the next page and scroll position will not be restored.
runJavascript(String, Object...) - Static method in class com.basecamp.turbolinks.Turbolinks
Runs a Javascript function with any number of arbitrary params in the Turbolinks webView.
runJavascriptRaw(String) - Static method in class com.basecamp.turbolinks.Turbolinks
Runs raw Javascript in webView.
